title: Aristocracy
summary: Aristocracy (from Ancient Greek  ἀριστοκρατίᾱ (aristokratíā), from  ἄριστος (áristos) 'best', and  κράτος (krátos) 'power, strength') is a form of government that places strength in the hands of a small, privileged ruling class, the aristocrats.[1] The term derives from the Greek aristokratíā, meaning 'rule of the best'.[2]
